members.member: \ingroup types \brief Typedef for the fastest unsigned integer with at least 8 bit.
\ingroup types \brief Typedef for the fastest signed integer with at least 8 bit.
\ingroup types \brief Typedef for an unsigned integer with at least 8 bit.
\ingroup types \brief Typedef for a signed integer with at least 8 bit.
\ingroup types \brief Typedef for an unsigned integer with exactly 8 bit.
\ingroup types \brief Typedef for a signed integer with exactly 8 bit.

member.name: M:BDAL.MethodManagement.SubMethodDialogs.SaveMethodDialog(System.Windows.Forms.Form,System.String,System.String,System.String,BDAL.MethodManagement.SubmethodType,System.String)
member.summary:
Display a file save dialog.
Will create the methodset directory and set comment, readonly, SOP flags
member.param: if not "unknown": show only method sets which contain this submethod

default submethod name.
If this is not empty, or the user sets a name a new Submethod for the program type will be created if there is not allready one! This is so that the submethod name can be quieried.
member.exception: one of the arguments is null

default submethod name.
If this is not empty, or the user sets a name a new Submethod for the program type will be created if there is not allready one! This is so that the submethod name can be quieried.
member.exception: one of the arguments is null

Display a file save dialog.
Will create the methodset directory and set comment, readonly, SOP flags
member.remarks: this will assert, if no valid form parent if found
member.param: dictionary with alternative names, can be null
The name of the program from which the part name should be taken as default part name. If unknown, the method name will be used.
name to display for the filter. If empty, the default name for programId will be used
